actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend sections 206 and 208 of the Labor Management Relations Act, 1947 to provide that the national emergency procedures thereunder may be applied to strikes or lockouts which will cause losses of agricultural crops.

summary.text: Provides, under the Labor Management Relations Act of 1947, that the national emergency procedures thereunder may be applied to strikes or lockouts which will cause losses of agricultural crops.

titles.title: A bill to amend sections 206 and 208 of the Labor Management Relations Act, 1947 to provide that the national emergency procedures thereunder may be applied to strikes or lockouts which will cause losses of agricultural crops.
